message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start!
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it a bit more even.  This is my offer before inflation eats away at it!
Come on Bob, 58-42 is as fair as it gets! Inflation is eating away, let's settle!
Alice, we're running out of time! This is my final offer - let's be reasonable and take what we can get.
